name: ASCII Fields
description:
EDIT: Stealth update to add a sleeping transition, and an on-command tutorial option (hit O/Z on the title screen)

A modest text-based farm sim made for Terminal Jam

In-game tutorial explains how the game works, but it should feel familiar to fans of `other` farming sims..

O/Z - Select Tool

X - Use Tool

U/D/L/R - move (bump into things to interact with them)

Expect a content update after the release of Ice Palace Pinball...

If you want hints/teasers, talk to Susie at the seed shop south of your farm.

Also.. why not read a book?
